name: Asterrunner
description:
Travel through dangerous asteroid field, avoid obstacles and collect different type of loot:
◉ Blueprints allow you to create new types of ships and paint jobs;
◉ Ammo for space gun allows you to blow up asteroids in front of you;
◉ Shield generator gives you invulnerability for 10 seconds;

Collect all ships and travel as far as possible.
Download Asterrunner now!
